UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The effects of charge and lipophilicity on the antibacterial activity of undecapeptides derived from bovine lactoferricin.
Literature.Author: Strøm MB, Rekdal O, Svendsen JS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=50µg/ml)
